name: Toronto King St Transit Pilot_ Detailed Traffic & Pedestrian Volumes
description: Toronto King St Transit Pilot_ Detailed Traffic & Pedestrian Volumes

schema.name: px
schema.label: ID of the traffic signal
schema.description: ID of the traffic signal, can be joined to Traffic Signals Tabular

schema.name: datetime_bin
schema.label: ID of the traffic signal
schema.description: ID of the traffic signal, can be joined to Traffic Signals Tabular

schema.name: classification
schema.label: classification
schema.description: Differentiates between Pedestrians, Light Vehicles, etc.

schema.name: leg
schema.label: leg
schema.description: Cardinal direction of the approach. W for the western approach to the intersection.

schema.name: dir
schema.label: dir
schema.description: Cardinal direction of the movement. EB for Eastbound traffic in the western approach to the intersection.

schema.name: volume
schema.label: volume
schema.description: Number of observed vehicles/persons of that classification during the specified time period.
